title: Why does Ranked suck so much at the moment?
body: Every win feels like I'm hard-carrying and every loss feels like I got matched with 4 Bronze. Like, are people getting boosted to Platinum or is there just an influx of shitters because we're nearing the end of the season?

replies.body:
If you are good like you clearly up. the match maker will match you with shit players who get rofl stomped by ave players and you get smacked

The match maker cannot seem to make balanced teams. I get about 3 good games in 10.  The rest are one sided stomps which sucks regardless if i win or lose.

Worse, i am a support. If i get rated highly im fucked because supports can't carry. STOP GIVING ME HIGH MATCH RATINGS RIOT I SUP MAIN!!!!

I win lane with my adc in most games... has little impact on games outcomes
Other lanes are far more important.

A top with less gold can 1 vs 1 slay a solo adc. Thats how the game is balanced and is why ADC need supports.
I understand the feeling. A lot of my ranked games have been stomp or be stomped. Nothing feels like a balanced game anymore.
Yeah around this time of year is when everyone starts scrambling to get to gold for the end of season rewards.
Sounds to me like you're about where you should be. Win some, lose some, throw some, carry some. Equilibrium bro.

Platinum feels quite bronze because they've made it so easy to get to plat or be boosted, pre-plat you get a free win in promos you've reached once before and can duo with 4 friends, alot easier to be boosted to plat this year
